tool_description: Facebook VietNam User Info, Convert  UID To Phone and Phone To UID
title: Facebook User Info

api_list.name: find_comment_find_get
api_list.description: Find Comment by UID or by_object_id(PageID, GroupID)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-user-info.p.rapidapi.com/comment/find"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-user-info.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
